previewArticle.title: Ivory Coast vs. Japan: 2014 World Cup | Group C Preview

recapArticle.title: Ivory Coast 2, Japan 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group C Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Zachary Meisenheimer
timelineItems.text: Thank you for at least trying... #Nippon #SamuraiWarriors #TheBlues #CIVvJPN #Tifo

timelineItems.name: Alex Treblack
timelineItems.text: The Ivorian scarves are DOPE #civvjpn

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Japan. Conceded by Serge Aurier.
Hand ball by Wilfried Bony (Côte d'Ivoire).

timelineItems.name: Malena
timelineItems.text: I learned from the NYTs Style section that this game is good scouting for super models. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Juan-John
timelineItems.text: OK, so the Ivorian fans in the stands doing their dance are pretty cool. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: Did the commentator just call #CIV’s RB ‘Oreo’? #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Alyssa
timelineItems.text: Love the Ivory Coast fans dancing in the stands! #CIVvJPN #2014WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Cameron Kruzel
timelineItems.text: This is the most festive I have heard a crowd get so far. #WorldCup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: エクスナア
timelineItems.text: Nice ball to Okazaki but he would have had no one to work with even if he broke away from the defenders. #jpn #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football
timelineItems.text: Japan not too flash at the moment. #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: karelyn martinez
timelineItems.text: Those african drums *.* #CIVvJPN #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: tugablog
timelineItems.text: #CIV circulating ball well. Punctuated by bursts of speed on the wings. #JPN falling back on their system #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Shinji Okazaki (Japan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Cheick Tioté (Côte d'Ivoire).

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: This has been poor so far to say the least. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Japan. Conceded by Serge Aurier.

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: Tioté already destroying players! Poor little Japanese fella #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #CIVvJPN, live from Recife. Follow along here: http://t.co/5u2wprNY2X #CIV #JPN http://t.co/53i27hAQ4p

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #CIVvJPN, live from Recife. Follow along here: http://t.co/5u2wprNY2X #CIV #JPN http://t.co/53i27hAQ4p

timelineItems.name: Tyler Cronk
timelineItems.text: I don’t know who to cheer for in this #CIVvJPN game. Maybe Japan as one of the only Asian teams playing?

timelineItems.name: Juan-John
timelineItems.text: Less than 15 minutes in and I already miss Derek Rae’s PbP back when @ESPN had the UEFA Champions League. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Japan got great mileage out of that Honda goal. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Edward Pham
timelineItems.text: What a goal by Honda. That's a name I haven't heard since the last World Cup. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Shinji Okazaki (Japan).
Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Randy
timelineItems.text: HONDA!!!!!! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Blake H. Schmidt
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup2014 FACTS⚽️: #WorldCup host #Brazil has the second largest #Japanese population outside of #Japan at around 1.5 million. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: What a bloody hit though, not long after the commentator saying the #CIV keeper hadn’t been tested yet (snigger) #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Wilfried Bony (Côte d'Ivoire).
Atsuto Uchida (Japan) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Robert Cox
timelineItems.text: Aaand cue a metric crapton of car puns #Honda #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: William Olyphant
timelineItems.text: Ivory Coast is my team . Obviously !! #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: George D. Metellus
timelineItems.text: It sounds like a loud, intense atmosphere in Recife for #CIVvJPN. ALLEZ LES ELEPHANTS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Atsuto Uchida (Japan) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Keisuke Honda.
Foul by Yuto Nagatomo (Japan).
Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Match ends, Côte d'Ivoire 2, Japan 1.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Bakota
timelineItems.text: Wow. Quite the camera they're using to zoom in on that insect. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Japan. Conceded by Cheick Tioté.

timelineItems.name: Guy Yelencsics
timelineItems.text: Five second long zoom-in of a bug on the pitch. WTF ESPN. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Serey Die (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Maya Yoshida (Japan).

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: FIFA ranked 46th Japan schooling 23rd ranked Ivory Coast proving, as always, that the FIFA ranking systems are a farce. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: man, Japan is so fun to watch. They're playing like Spain should've. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: エクスナア
timelineItems.text: Uchiha is amazing at becoming a winger. Not so amazing at shooting. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: CIV defense in shambles right now. Barry is up to the challenge though. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Nils Moojen
timelineItems.text: Cote d'Ivoire might be better if they could breath. Someone's washed those shirts on 'hot' cycle, and chucked them in the drier. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football
timelineItems.text: Get the spray son... Wait. Does he even have it???? #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Yaya Touré should've done much better there, but its over for a goal kick. 1-0 Japan. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football
timelineItems.text: That was a perfect time for #spray but ref bottled it. #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Tom Dorozenko
timelineItems.text: Just discovered my new favorite player at the #WorldCup: Boubacar Barry. What a name! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: All on the Pitch
timelineItems.text: Are the commentators contractually obligated to mention the ref's aerosol markers every free kick? #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Yaya Touré.

timelineItems.name: Donald Akamagwuna
timelineItems.text: Are they all Sprinters?? #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Em
timelineItems.text: Looks like it is raining on #CIVvJPN at Arena Pernambuco, Recife #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: CIV slowly getting into this game. Neither taking much care in possession. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Hunter McGaughey
timelineItems.text: I could have put a better shot on goal than Kalou did there. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: James Tuccori
timelineItems.text: Two players I enjoy watching - not so much for skill, but more presense - in the #CIVvJPN match in Honda and Gervinho (aka Forehead).

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Côte d'Ivoire. Conceded by Shinji Okazaki.
Foul by Shinji Okazaki (Japan).
Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: エクスナア
timelineItems.text: Japan's back line is on their game and the midfielders are providing excellent support. #JPN #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Jersey Kid
timelineItems.text: Half an hour in, both teams have had there chances but Japan leads on the scoresheet #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Phil Trueira
timelineItems.text: Ivory Coast as a team probably has like 2000 lbs on Japan #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Justin Davies
timelineItems.text: The spray can do it on a wet night in Recife.. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: #CIV tend to have these mental phases where they just gan radge and are shit. Clearly having one now #JPN could do them over here! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Ian
timelineItems.text: 60 minutes left in #CIVvJPN and Ivory Coast players look inconsolable and more desperate with each miss #calmdown

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Wilfried Bony.
Corner,  Côte d'Ivoire. Conceded by Maya Yoshida.

timelineItems.name: Michele K. Baer
timelineItems.text: I hear drums in that stadium. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football
timelineItems.text: African keepers have that delightful combo of South American crazy and Oceanian calamity. #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Offside, Côte d'Ivoire. Arthur Boka tries a through ball, but Wilfried Bony is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Keisuke Honda (Japan) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Shinji Kagawa.
Corner,  Japan. Conceded by Souleymane Bamba.

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: Gervinho looking lively. Why was he never this good for Arsenal. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Chris Harrison
timelineItems.text: Does he want to kick it any harder? #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Wilfried Bony (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Serey Die with a cross.
Foul by Serge Aurier (Côte d'Ivoire).
Yuya Osako (Japan) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Yaya Touré.

timelineItems.name: paris byrd
timelineItems.text: tryna write a liturgy amidst #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Kenya Gospel Website
timelineItems.text: Okay Let's See . Who Loves Ivory Coast more than his Bed. ? #Awake RT #TeamAfrica #Ivorycoast #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Serge Aurier (Côte d'Ivoire).
Shinji Kagawa (Japan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire).
Atsuto Uchida (Japan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Arthur Boka with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: CIV pressing, but haven't tested the Goal Keeper much yet. A lot of blocked shots and misses. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Andrew Winner
timelineItems.text: These Ivory Coast jerseys remind me that I should go to the gym more. #CIVvJPN #CIV #JPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Yaya Touré with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Nathan
timelineItems.text: #CIV are creating so much yet the finishing is beyond awful. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Evan Doherty
timelineItems.text: It's raining so hard here in Natal, the satellite showing #CIVvJPN at the bar we're at cut out for a few minutes

timelineItems.name: Kieran.
timelineItems.text: It’s weird not hearing people shout ‘shoot’ at Tioté when he’s at the edge of the box! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Côte d'Ivoire 0, Japan 1.

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: @SkyFootball i dont think Ivory Coast management bought Yaya Toure a birthday cake either. Very poor so far. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Rana Malook
timelineItems.text: This Japanese defence has so far been impenetrable! Arguably the best defensive display of the #WorldCup this far #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Jeffrey Bussmann
timelineItems.text: The Japanese support in Recife is phenomenal. Força Japão!!! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Mikhail 4 #TeamSpain
timelineItems.text: The Ivorians are playing good football and Japanese are very good at the back. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: Great game so far, Japan are proving quite the handful with plenty of pace & movement. Nice strike from Honda #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Robert Shimmons
timelineItems.text: "Left foot. Laces. Jumpers for goalposts. Isn't it? Wasn't it? Marvellous." Lee Dixon IS Ron Manager #CIVvJPN #ITVWorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tayler Leamon
timelineItems.text: The Ivorians are gonna need Drogba. #EnterDidier #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Côte d'Ivoire 0, Japan 1.
Foul by Shinji Kagawa (Japan).
Serey Die (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Serge Aurier (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Yaya Touré.
Attempt missed. Wilfried Bony (Côte d'Ivoire) with an attempt from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Steele (ライアン)
timelineItems.text: This game will probably determine #JPN's finish to the group. Holding this lead would be pretty crucial. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Jason Dalley
timelineItems.text: I'm just going to pretend that @RealSaltLake game never happened.. On to more #WorldCup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire).
Makoto Hasebe (Japan) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Makoto Hasebe (Japan) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Keisuke Honda with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Henry Thomas
timelineItems.text: The slo mo facial expressions of Ivory Coast missing their chances are stealing the show #CIVvJPN #FifaWorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hotaru Yamaguchi (Japan) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Offside, Côte d'Ivoire. Boubacar Barry tries a through ball, but Wilfried Bony is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rana Malook
timelineItems.text: Genuine both footed players are very rare these days. Honda is just that #classact #CIVvJPN #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Keisuke Honda (Japan) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cheick Tioté (Côte d'Ivoire).
Shinji Okazaki (Japan) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Souleymane Bamba (Côte d'Ivoire).
Delay in match Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Why is Drogba not in this game yet? #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Yay magic spray! He's saved! #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Asif
timelineItems.text: Did some forget to say 'good morning' to Toure today? He has done nothing so far. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Yasuhito Endo (Japan).
Yaya Touré (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Serge Aurier with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Tom Watt
timelineItems.text: #SBSWorldCup #CIVvJPN Japan looking comfortable now, Honda and Kagawa orchestrating their team beautifully #CulturedMidfielders

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Yaya Touré is a terrifying man. I would not want to be on the receiving end of his anger. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Shinji Kagawa (Japan).
Serge Aurier (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Wilfried Bony (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gervinho.
Corner,  Côte d'Ivoire. Conceded by Masato Morishige.
Attempt missed. Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Arthur Boka.

timelineItems.name: Rana Malook
timelineItems.text: For all the deserved praise for Japan however, Ivory Coast have been very poor. Kalou/Toure/Bony underwhelming #WorldCup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hotaru Yamaguchi (Japan).
Yaya Touré (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Neither team very accurate in their shooting. JPN(on target/off): 3/6. CIV: 5/12. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: ®DEUSTHLAND
timelineItems.text: CIV is forcing me to support Japan #2014WorldCup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Rana Malook
timelineItems.text: Toure couldn't quite manage the Diego Costa dive there #CIVvJPN #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Masato Morishige (Japan).
Didier Drogba (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Kemal Atlay
timelineItems.text: 10 seconds being subbed in and Drogba already makes a big impact #CIVvJPN #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Gilly
timelineItems.text: I may have just shrieked. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Shinji Okazaki (Japan).
Cheick Tioté (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Gilly
timelineItems.text: I love football #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Taddeo
timelineItems.text: Drogba comes on and it's a different game! #CIVvJPN #WorldCup14

timelineItems.name: Brenton Speed
timelineItems.text: Outstanding Ivory Coast... Great crossing... But that's what you get for an hour of Kagawa butchering the ball!! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Travis Amo
timelineItems.text: Drogba's presence is doing wonders for the Ivorians. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Ryan Krasnoo
timelineItems.text: Just Drogba's demeanor on the pitch is a revelation. He oozes the vibe that his team is going to score. Always, always dangerous. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Nick Wagner
timelineItems.text: That's what that Japanese keeper gets for wearing a different color on each boot AND glove. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Michael Dixon
timelineItems.text: These games have been madness. All of them. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Keisuke Honda (Japan) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Atsuto Uchida with a cross.
Foul by Salomon Kalou (Côte d'Ivoire).
Atsuto Uchida (Japan) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Gervinho (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked. Assisted by Salomon Kalou.

timelineItems.name: エクスナア
timelineItems.text: Japanese defense holding strong, looking impressive to me so far. Offense with the vision, lacking the execution. #JPN #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: George D. Metellus
timelineItems.text: Fans of Cote D'Ivoire are pulling a Ric Flair, "WOOOOOOO" #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Arthur Boka (Côte d'Ivoire) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Juan-John
timelineItems.text: God Bless @ESPN’s Derek Rae for telling the Japanese fan not to yawn. :-) #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Offside, Japan. Maya Yoshida tries a through ball, but Atsuto Uchida is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sara Habbo
timelineItems.text: I love the #CIV fans. They're having so much fun. #WorldCup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Johanne Edgington
timelineItems.text: OMG! When did that goal happen? Obviously when I lost the live stream #NYCvRBNY #USOC2014. Time to really concentrate on #CIVvJPN match now!

timelineItems.name: Ryan Krasnoo
timelineItems.text: Another friendly reminder for those watching #CIVvJPN: You're getting a treat by having Derek Rae commentate. He's quite magnificent.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Japan pressing more now, but it leads to nothing, and CIV regains possession. Still plenty of time left in this game. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.name: All on the Pitch
timelineItems.text: Make fun of the Ivory Coast voodoo fan/mummy in the stands at your own peril. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Ben Megathlin
timelineItems.text: Bony makes way for Ya Konan. I don't know if that's a good thing or a bad thing. #CIVvJPN #WC2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Yoshito Okubo (Japan) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Keisuke Honda.
Didier Drogba (Côte d'Ivoire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: Japan look like they've ran out of steam here. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Didier Drogba (Côte d'Ivoire) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: All on the Pitch
timelineItems.text: I don't think I've ever been as excited as some of these people seeing themselves on the big screen. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.text: Japan do know they are behind? #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.text: Three Didiers on the pitch at one time for #CotedIvoire #seeingtriple #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: ButteredFrog
timelineItems.text: So, #CIVvJPN or actually getting out and doing stuff #inertia

timelineItems.name: William Gough
timelineItems.text: Ivory Coast Vs Japan should be a fun game. No heart attacks. C'mon Samurai Blue. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Ramnarayanan
timelineItems.text: Okazaki is the player to watch out for this match #CIVvJPN #FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football

timelineItems.name: Kensley
timelineItems.text: Last match of the day #CIVvJPN #WorldCup ���

timelineItems.name: Andrew McDonnell
timelineItems.text: Raining heavy in Recife for this very late match #CIVvJPN #2014FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.name: Alex Strauch
timelineItems.text: Souleymane Bamba. My favourite World Cup name thus far. #SBSWorldCup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Christian Cole
timelineItems.text: I hope Serge Aurier from Ivory Coast comes to Arsenal. Ideal replacement for Sagna. #CIVvJPN #Arsenal #2014WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Côte d'Ivoire. Conceded by Eiji Kawashima.

timelineItems.name: Mikhail 4 #TeamSpain
timelineItems.text: All the best of luck #IvoryCoast. Its gonna be a tough one. #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Kaleb Burchett
timelineItems.text: Pulling for Ivory Coast... Always like watching them play football #CIVvJPN #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Ryan Krasnoo
timelineItems.text: ESPN hit a home run with their play-by-play men at the World Cup. Ian Darke, Adrian Healey, & now my favorite Derek Rae announcing #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: C'est Moi 這是我 ™
timelineItems.text: COME ON COTE D’IVOIRE!!! MAKE AFRICANS PROUD!!! #CIVvJPN #BRAZIL2014

timelineItems.name: Jason Connelly
timelineItems.text: In a day featuring England v Italy - it's this late matchup I've been looking forward to most. #CIVvJPN #SamuraiBlue

timelineItems.name: Janina
timelineItems.text: Alright, time for #CIVvJPN! Ganiyan talaga pag WC, walang pahinga.

timelineItems.name: Aleks V
timelineItems.text: Will have to settle for reminiscing about Honda's RPL past. Still, can't wait to see what he and Kagawa come up with! #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.name: Dougiejam
timelineItems.text: This year I got to visit Japan such a beautiful country & even nicer people for all my Japanese friends #GoSamuraiBlue #CIVvJPN #WorldCup :)

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Côte d'Ivoire. Conceded by Masato Morishige.
Corner,  Côte d'Ivoire. Conceded by Masato Morishige.
Hand ball by Didier Drogba (Côte d'Ivoire).

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: This is well played by Drogba to see out the game. #worldcup #CIVvJPN

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Didier Ya Konan (Côte d'Ivoire) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Nick Ellercamp
timelineItems.text: Lol at the guy holding up the "1000% elephants" sign #CIVvJPN #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football
timelineItems.text: Proper route one stuff from Japan now. #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Didier Ya Konan (Côte d'Ivoire) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Second Half ends, Côte d'Ivoire 2, Japan 1.

timelineItems.name: West Sydney Football
timelineItems.text: Let's see if Japan can score. #CIVvJPN #WorldCup2014
